name: pwa-with-vanilla-js-master
description: Progressive web apps are a way to bring that native app feeling to a traditional web app. With PWAs we can enhance our website with mobile app features which increase usability and offer a great user experience. In this article, we are going to build a PWA from scratch with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Here are the topics we'll cover: - What is a Progressive Web App ? - Markup - Styling - Show data with JavaScript - Web App Manifest - What is a Service Worker? - Cache the assets - Fetch the assets - Register the Service Worker - Final thoughts - Next steps
